ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh diffrence is that there is no way to regain mana quickly like their is for hp. Naeeldar ... From: Lange, Stephen  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh diffrence is that there is no way to regain mana quickly like their is
for hp.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Lange, Stephen <SLANGE@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 01, 1999 3:26 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


>From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>
>
>
>>Not a bad idea, but 30-50% health would be better
>>in my personal opinion. 50 hp to a high level
>>player out of their total of over 1000 would
>>simply be unrealistic. But it's a good idea
>>all the same.
>
>I would look at it as a you have just been revived off your deathbed and
are
>very weak. Keeping it that low would certainly remove that, die, repop
with
>full heal attack syndrome. On a similar note, I feel when we die all
>players should repop with zero mana.
>
>Boy would that make them cry.
>
>>
